Author: putanuncainputa
Text: Maybe don't like on diet coke too much for a few days bc that shit may be a godsend most of the time but it clogs you up real bad, and est some green veggies? Some spinach? Have you tried with some dried plums? You leave them to soak overnight and then next day, first thing in the morning, eat the plums (about 3 should b fine) and drink the liquid  Also I don't know where you're from or if you have access to yerba mate, but drinking mate is like the best laxative and the bestest of friends when you restrict
